5.description: Sleep in and enjoy an afternoon of spectacular snorkeling away from the crowds! Depending on conditions, our Captain will take you to either Molokini, Turtle Reef, or Coral Gardens. These sites offer spectacular snorkeling among a myriad of turtles and dynamic sea life. The afternoon snorkel adventure includes all of the enjoyment of the morning snorkel at a fraction of the price. On-board amenities and an attentive crew assures your comfort, safety, and enjoyment! * Refreshments upon boarding * All gear and instruction provided * Delicious grilled lunch * Premium open bar

1.tour_name: Morning Molokini & Turtle Town Snorkel Tour
1.description: The AM excursion is our most popular snorkeling adventure to the best underwater destination in Hawai’i! Molokini features flourishing marine life in exceptionally clear water with visibility over 150 feet. Turtle Town is bordered by a vibrant coral reef on lava formations, which is very attractive to sea turtles. This 6 hour trip is always a pleasure! * Refreshments served upon boarding * All gear provided * Optional SCUBA or SNUBA * Delicious BBQ lunch * The MOST amenities of any boat on Maui * Premium open bar * Optional underwater photos / videography

4.description: Majestic sunset scenery, sparkling sea, soulful music, sumptuous cuisine, and smooth cocktails combine into perfectly pleasing ambiance! Sip your favorite wine, beer, or cocktail and feel the spirit of the islands as you create fond memories. The warm moments remain as the sunset gives way to the stars. Enjoy! * Live Hawaiian music by Mitch Kepa * Premium Open Bar * Buffet of delicious cuisine * Many amenities including restrooms * Spacious decks for relaxing or dancing

3.description: The seasonal whale watch (Dec 15th - March 30th) snorkel cruise is an ideal excursion, combining three favorite ocean adventures in Maui. Enjoy a scenic cruise, epic whale watching, and delightful snorkeling all in one afternoon! We provide everything make sure you have an amazing experience. * GUARANTEED humpback whale sightings * Hydrophone to hear the whales * Refreshments upon boarding * Delicious BBQ lunch * Premium open bar * All gear and instruction provided * The MOST amenities of any snorkel boat on Maui
